response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value to both of us. This product, tailored to meet your specific needs and desires, is worth $1,500,000 to you. I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,400,000. This exclusive offer is designed to ensure that you benefit from the unparalleled quality and features this product offers while also securing a significant saving compared to its market value.

Please consider this offer carefully and let me know if you have any questions or require further information. I am here to assist you throughout the process and make sure your experience with our product is nothing short of exceptional.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1400000}
